metadata.title: CVE-2024-29164 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 through 1.14.3 contains a stack buffer overflow in H5R__decode_heap,resulting in the corruption of the instruction pointer and causing denialof service or potential code execution.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
